participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Emily is always looking for new opportunities to grow both personally and professionally. She is confident and enjoys being in leadership roles.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and outgoing, Jake loves to meet new people and enjoys being involved in school activities. He is passionate about helping others and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_2.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i am currently in high school.
